properties.entry: Step 6 of 6: Describe your personal values

What is important for you in a relationship?

It is essential that you emphasis topics that are important for you.
Choose between

  • "not so important", i.e. you hardly do care about if your partner has this attribute
  • "important", i.e. this attribute is desirable
  • "very important", i.e. it is mandatory for you in a relationship

The following details will be used in the "Personal Values" search to find matching partners.
